channel.title: Help rep++
channel.description: how do i realease my client to everyone like i know you put it to a download website like mediafire but how do i make it so no one can leech it and it works for everyones computer ?

item.title: Help rep++
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

It’s not the client people will leech, its the server, which is on your computer.

Also, the client should work for most peoples computers, at least people running windows.
If the client doesn’t work on Mac or Linux, you might have to edit where the client downloads the cache, and where the client loads the cache from. (Somewhere in signlink.java i believe, Not sure. Havn’t messed with RSPS’s in a while)

Read full topic
